turn.0: Hi, I'm your automated assistant. I can answer your questions about Open Web Analytics.
turn.2: Open Web Analytics Open Web Analytics (OWA) is open-source web analytics software created by Peter Adams.
turn.4: OWA is written in PHP and uses a MySQL database, which makes it compatible for running with an AMP solution stack on various web servers.
turn.5: Is it comparable to Google Analytics?
turn.6: OWA is comparable to Google Analytics, though OWA is server software anyone can install and run on their own host, while Google Analytics is a software service offered by Google.
turn.7: Is there anything else interesting about this technology?
turn.8: OWA supports tracking with WordPress and MediaWiki, two popular web site frameworks.
turn.10: This application helps you keep track of and observe the influx of views on your website.
turn.12: The program also tracks your competitors and their company's growth compared to yours.
